MemberSignature.Value: public static Java.Nio.FloatBuffer? Wrap (float[]? array, int offset, int length);
.method public static hidebysig class Java.Nio.FloatBuffer Wrap(float32[] array, int32 offset, int32 length) cil managed
Public Shared Function Wrap (array As Single(), offset As Integer, length As Integer) As FloatBuffer
public: static Java::Nio::FloatBuffer ^ Wrap(cli::array <float> ^ array, int offset, int length);
static member Wrap : single[] * int * int -> Java.Nio.FloatBuffer

Docs.param: The array that will back the new buffer
The offset of the subarray to be used; must be non-negative and no larger than array.length. The new buffer's position will be set to this value.
The length of the subarray to be used; must be non-negative and no larger than array.length - offset. The new buffer's limit will be set to offset + length.
Docs.summary: Wraps a float array into a buffer.

format.a: Java documentation for java.nio.FloatBuffer.wrap(float[], int, int).

if array is null.
